detail_desc: Turtleneck body in sturdy jersey with a sheen. Draping at the front, a concealed zip at the back and puff sleeves with gathers and concealed elastication at the shoulders. Lower section with laser-cut edges for a smooth silhouette, and press-studs at the crotch.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a decorative bow on each shoulder.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in double-weave, crinkled organic cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dungaree shorts in soft seersucker made from a cotton and linen blend. Straps with adjustable buttoning and buttons at the sides. Open chest pocket, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Lined. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Boxer shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Hat in braided straw with an indented crown. Width of brim approx. 3.5 cm.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Swim trousers and top in textured, UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Shorts in soft, washed, organic cotton denim with an elasticated waist, fly with decorative buttons, and side pockets.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Romper suit in soft, organic slub cotton jersey with buttons at the top, an open chest pocket and short sleeves and legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Cardigan in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a soft, brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, buttons down the front and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, patch pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, patch pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, patch pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Calf-length dress in airy, viscose chiffon crêpe with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves with elastication, pin-tucks and a frill at the cuffs. Gathered, elasticated seams at the hips with pin-tucks and a flared skirt. Airy lining.

Calf-length dress in airy, viscose chiffon crêpe with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves with elastication, pin-tucks and a frill at the cuffs. Gathered, elasticated seams at the hips with pin-tucks and a flared skirt. Airy lining.
Hooded poncho towel in soft cotton terry.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Blouse in airy, patterned crinkled chiffon with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with a pleat at the back and gathers at the front of the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Relaxed-fit shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in a crinkled, organic cotton weave with wide, elastic shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Open front pockets and narrow, covered elastication at the hems.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Sun hat in an airy weave made from a linen blend. Lining in a cotton weave. The cotton content of the hat is partly organic.

Blouse in airy plumeti chiffon with gathered seams at the front to create a gently draped effect. Sweetheart neckline at the front, a straight, low-cut neckline at the back and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with gathered elastication at the shoulders and cuffs. Seam at the hem with a gently flared peplum and narrow elastication at the back. Jersey-lined bodice.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft fluffy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in washed cotton denim with covered elastication at the waist, diagonal side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
3/4-length jumpsuit in viscose jersey with a deep wrapover V-neck, long sleeves, a seam with narrow, concealed elastication under the bust and straight, wide legs.

Blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Decorative gathers at the neckline, long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs and an opening down the back with wide ties at the hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

Blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Decorative gathers at the neckline, long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs and an opening down the back with wide ties at the hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with butterfly sleeves and covered buttons down the front.
V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with butterfly sleeves and covered buttons down the front.

Wide shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the back and shoulders, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long cardigan in a soft, rib knit with a shawl collar, low dropped shoulders and patch front pockets. No fasteners.
Long cardigan in a soft, rib knit with a shawl collar, low dropped shoulders and patch front pockets. No fasteners.
Long top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Straight, relaxed fit with long sleeves and a curved hem.
Long top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Straight, relaxed fit with long sleeves and a curved hem.

Cardigan in a loose, chunky-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and wide, tapered sleeves.
Shorts in sturdy cotton denim with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and zip fly and buttons. Front pockets, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Playsuit in an airy, printed viscose weave with flutter sleeves and a square neckline. Buttons down the front and a seam with concealed elastication at the waist.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an embroidered pattern on the front and down the sleeves, and a ribbed trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
3/4-length trousers in a cotton weave with wide, gathered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Wide, straight legs with scalloped broderie anglaise at the hems.
3/4-length trousers in a cotton weave with wide, gathered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Wide, straight legs with scalloped broderie anglaise at the hems.
Short, fitted dress in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long, slightly wider sleeves and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Metal hair grips decorated with pearly plastic beads and sparkly stones. Length 9 cm, width approx. 2 cm.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in pleated jersey with a unique nursing feature. Opening at the back held together with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back and metal fastener at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and wide, ankle-length legs. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style jumper in a fluffy jacquard knit with a rib-knit turtle neck and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and flatlock seams.
Long cardigan in a soft fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Short, straight-cut dress in sequined velour with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Jersey lining.
Short, straight-cut dress in sequined velour with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Reflective detail on the sleeves, thumbholes at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
